name: Mark Owen Riedl
content: Entertainment Intelligence and Human-Centered AI Labs Entertainment Intelligence and Human-Centered AI Labs Director: Mark Riedl Mark Riedl Professor School of Interactive Computing, College of Computing, Georgia Institute of Technology Associate Director GT Machine Learning Center Follow Google Scholar Semantic Scholar BlueSky Twitter Mastodon LinkedIn The Entertainment Intelligence and Human-Centered AI Labs seek to make fundamental contributions to the fields of artificial intelligence and machine learning by researching intelligent systems that can understand and enhance the human condition.
